links.label: Safe, enjoyable vacations - discover our vacation ideas
ALPS RESORTS - My way of vacation

content.title: ALPS RESORTS - My way of vacation

content.textLeft:
Plenty of space for the whole family and your friends

Private, completely individual, independent with plenty of freedom. The advantages of a vacation in a chalet or apartment are clear.

The fully equipped vacation residences of ALPS RESORTS are located in some of the most beautiful places in Austria and the German state of Bavaria: right in the mountains, on the slopes, in national park areas or by the lake.

No set meal times, no fighting for the loungers in the wellness area. The well-proportioned chalets and apartments with their private SPA facilities offer plenty of privacy and space to enjoy time with loved ones.
content.textRight:
The ALPS RESORTS regions at a glance:

>> Tyrol

>> Salzburg

>> Carinthia

>> Styria

>> Bavaria

content.text:
Tyrol

Bergeralm Chalets

Staying at the Bergeralm Chalets by ALPS RESORTS you will get to see the Austrian Alps in their most beautiful form. Be enchanted by the scenic charms of the Tyrolean Wipptal and enjoy the comfort of the cosy wooden chalets with the whole family or with friends. The chalets are located right next to the Bergeralm Ski & Leisure Arena with its diverse range of slopes for all abilities.

>> Relaxing holiday in a chalet in the Wipptal valley in the Tyrol

  • 92-125 m2 for up to 10 people
  • private sauna
  • 30 km from Innsbruck
  • a few metres from the Bergeralm ski area

 

Alpenchalets Biberwier Zugspitze

The impressive, 2,962 m high Zugspitze is one of the most beautiful panoramic mountains in the Alps. The popular holiday region of the Tyrolean Zugspitz Arena at the foot of Germany's highest peak is surrounded by a majestic mountain landscape. And right in the middle of it all you will find the new, exclusive ALPS holiday resort Alpenchalets Biberwier.

>> Holiday in a holiday home in Reutte in the Tyrolean Zugspitz Arena

  • 120 m2 for up to 10 people
  • private sauna
  • at the valley station of the Marienbergbahn in the Tyrolean Zugspitz Arena

   

Chalet 149 Westendorf

Chalet 149 Westendorf is located in Westendorf, only 15 kilometres from world-famous Kitzbühel. The resort with a total of 14 exclusive holiday apartments is located on a sunny high plateau in the eastern Tyrol and was named the "most beautiful village in Europe" by the "Entente Florale" in 1998.

>> Exclusive holiday apartments in Westendorf near Kitzbühel

  • 62-150 m2 for up to 6 people
  • partly with private infrared sauna
  • 3 minutes walk to the valley station
  • dogs allowed (on request)

  

Dorfresort Kitzbühel

Just 6 kilometres from Kitzbühel, you can unwind at the exclusive Dorfresort Kitzbühel. In this dog-friendly resort, holiday wishes are granted thanks to the wellness area, restaurant and large outdoor space with pond.

>> High-quality chalets & holiday apartments near Kitzbühel

  • 32-135 m² for up to 7 people
  • wellness area and saunas
  • KitzSki only 5 km away
  • Lake Schwarzsee only 4 km away
  • dogs allowed

  

  

Zillertal Suites Fügen

The Zillertal Suites Fügen offer a comfortable, dog-friendly home for your vacation in the "most active valley in the world". The vacation apartments are furnished to a high standard and fully equipped. In the wellness area you can relax in one of the 3 saunas or float in the heated pool.

>> Modern vacation apartments with pool in Zillertal

  • 38-78m² for up to 6 persons
  • wellness area with pool and saunas
  • 850m Spieljoch cable car
  • 750m Zillertal thermal baths
  • dogs allowed

Salzburg

Tauern Lodges Uttendorf

14 double and terraced lodges as well as a single apartment are located near the popular bathing lake with a view of the Hohe Tauern. Thanks to the surrounding ski areas, the Tauern Lodges Uttendorf are the perfect base for your skiing vacation. For example, the Weißsee Gletscherwelt is only about 18 kilometres away and the ski bus is only a three-minute walk away.

>> Vacation in a vacation home in the Hohe Tauern National Park region

  • 68-135 m2 for up to 10 people
  • bathing lake nearby
  • dogs allowed in some chalets (on request)

  

Carpe Solem Mariapfarr

In addition to its excellent location, the resort is popular due to its direct connection to the Samsunn Vitality and Wellness Centre, which is free of charge for our guests for 3 hours a day. Only 100 m from your vacation apartment in Mariapfarr, the free ski bus takes you to the nearby ski areas.

>> Sun-kissed time-out in 4-star vacation apartments in Lungau

  • 34-123 m2 for up to 10 people
  • partly with private sauna
  • direct connection to the Samsunn Vitality and Wellness Centre (3 h daily free of charge)
  • only 6 km from the ski slope
  • dogs allowed in some vacation apartments (on request)

  

Carpe Solem Rauris

The Carpe Solem Rauris combines the flexibility and independence of a vacation apartment with hotel comfort and exclusivity. It is therefore perfect for all those who long for privacy and lots of space on vacation without having to do without hotel facilities.

>> Exclusive vacation apartments with ski-in/ski-out in Rauris in Salzburg's Pinzgau region

  • 35-120 m2 for up to 10 people
  • 1.000 m2 wellness area, ski school & INTERSPORT in the resort
  • directly by the ski slopes (Ski-In/Ski-Out)
  • dogs allowed in some vacation apartments (on request)

  

Tauernsuites Mitterwirt

Only 8 km from Zell am See-Kaprun, the tastefully furnished apartments and the in-house wellness area promise relaxing vacations in the Hohe Tauern National Park vacation region. Also not far away: Top ski regions and numerous hiking routes. The Mitterwirt restaurant across the street provides culinary delights.

>> Feel-good vacation in Piesendorf in the Zell am See region

  • 22-124 m2 for up to 12 people
  • wellness area in the resort
  • only 5 km from the cable car
  • dogs allowed in some vacation apartments (on request)

  

Tauernresidence Radstadt

In the apartments of the Tauernresidence Radstadt by ALPS RESORTS, up to eight people will find enough space in up to 117 m² for a carefree and relaxing vacation. The heated outdoor pool provides the perfect way to cool off on hot summer days. In addition, you get the breathtaking view of the surrounding mountain scenery.

>> Vacation apartments and suites in Radstadt in the Pongau region of Salzburg

  • 44-117 m2 for up to 8 people
  • outdoor pool (in summer) & indoor wellness area
  • in the middle of the Ski amadé ski area
  • dogs allowed (on request)

  

Saalbach Suites

Vacations in one of the largest skiing and biking regions in Austria. Tastefully furnished vacation apartments and the hotel's own wellness and fitness areas ensure special feel-good moments in Salzburg's Pinzgau region. Thanks to the included JOKER CARD you can enjoy numerous free services in the Saalbach Hinterglemm region from May to October.

>> Exclusive vacation apartments in Saalbach Hinterglemm directly on the ski slopes

  • 25-78 m2 for up to 7 people
  • wellness area with pools, saunas, steam bath, solarium & fitness room
  • breakfast included, bar with drinks & snacks
  • directly by the ski slopes (ski-out)

  

Hideaway Dachstein West

At approx. 1,000m above sea level, you can leave everyday life behind you at the Hideaway Dachstein West. The modern, high-quality vacation apartments are fully equipped. A highlight: swimming in the infinity pool and enjoying the fantastic mountain view.

>> Modern apartments with infinity pool in St. Martin im Lammertal

  • 52-111 m2 for up to 8 people
  • wellness area with infinity pool and Finnish sauna
  • TennengauPLUS Card included
  • 2 km from the centre of St. Martin

Carinthia

Alpe Maritima Ossiacher See

Bathing vacation or mountain vacation? You don't have to choose – both are possible at Alpe Maritima Ossiacher See! The vacation resort is located at the foot of the 1,909 m high Gerlitzen. The valley station of the family ski area is only 150 metres away from your vacation apartment. In summer, you are only a few minutes' walk away from Lake Ossiach.

>> Modern vacation apartments at Lake Ossiach in Carinthia

  • 56-150 m2 for up to 9 people
  • only 150 m from the valley station
  • 7 minutes on foot to Lake Ossiach

  

Your glamping vacation in Carinthia

Camping meets glamour: At ALPS RESORTS, glamping in Carinthia means an unforgettable time in the land of a thousand lakes. Tree house, luxury tent or glamping chalet – your glamping vacation in Carinthia is guaranteed to be a very special experience with a choice of accommodation.

>> Rent glamping accommodation in Carinthia

  • 22,5-60 m2 for up to 6 persons
  • tree houses, luxury tents, glamping chalets
  • next to the ski slope
  • Aquarena Kötschach nearby
  • dogs allowed on request

Styria

Bergresort Hauser Kaibling

Right next to the Hauser Kaibling ski slope, in the middle of the Schladming 4-mountain ski area, hiking enthusiasts and skiers will find a luxury chalet vacation in Austria in the pool villas and apartment suites of the new ALPS RESORTS Bergresort Hauser Kaibling.

>> Luxurious chalet vacation in Haus im Ennstal/Schladming

  • 60-150 m2 for up to 10 people
  • private hot tub and/or private sauna
  • ski-in ski-out
  • dogs allowed (on request)

  

Villa Liesl

The combination of luxurious facilities and an ideal location – the resort is only 400 metres from the Hauser Kaibling valley station – guarantees a unique vacation experience and an unforgettable break in the Schladming-Dachstein vacation region.

>> High-quality penthouse suite and apartments in Haus im Ennstal/Schladming

  • 65-115 m2 for up to 8 people
  • private sauna
  • only 400 m from the ski slope
  • dogs allowed in some vacation apartments (on request)

  

Alpenrock Schladming

The resort in Schladming is the perfect place for a relaxing as well as active summer or winter vacation in Styria. One of the best-known ski regions, Schladming is particularly popular with families as well as with mountain sports enthusiasts. Also with Austria lovers who want to treat themselves to some time out in unique, beautiful countryside.

>> Modern vacation apartments in Schladming, Styria

  • 45-120 m2 for up to 8 people
  • 430 m² wellness area
  • only 100 m from the ski slopes
  • dogs allowed in some vacation apartments (on request)

  

Alpenchalets Reiteralm

Hiking and wellness in the mountain paradise of the Schladming-Dachstein vacation region in Styria: the dream of every nature lover looking to relax. In the Alpenchalets Reiteralm, the comfort of luxury chalets meets the tranquillity and magic of the mountain world in Styria.

>> Chalets on the ski slopes with hydro bath in the Schladming-Dachstein region

  • 120 m2 for up to 10 people
  • private sauna & private spa (indoor and/or outdoor)
  • directly by the ski slopes
  • dogs allowed in some chalets (on request)

  

Erzberg Alpin Resort

At Erzberg Alpin Resort you will spend your vacation in a resort with an interesting history: As part of a global unique tourism project, the former miners' settlement in Eisenerz, Styria, is being transformed into an apartment complex with modern vacation apartments.

>> Vacation apartments in Eisenerz in Hochsteiermark

  • 35-87 m2 for up to 10 people, clubhouse 270 m2 for up to 27 people
  • partly with private infrared sauna or hot tub
  • only 13 km from the cable car
  • dogs allowed

  

Almdorf Hohentauern

If you are longing for a luxurious vacation in a chalet or vacation home amongst Austria's mountains, a chalet in the Almdorf Hohentauern is the perfect choice. The chalet resort, built only a few years ago, is attractive due to its location in the centre of Hohentauern, Austria's first sports village.

>> Chalets with hot tub and sauna in Hohentauern in Murtal

  • 70-140 m2 for up to 10 people
  • partly with private spa (sauna, indoor and/or outdoor hot tub)
  • close to the ski slopes
  • dogs allowed in some chalets (on request)

  

FerienPark Kreischberg

Thanks to its natural and modern wooden construction, the FerienPark Kreischberg by ALPS RESORTS blends harmoniously into the unspoilt Styria countryside. In the green heart of Austria, the vacation apartments and vacation homes are a perfect starting point for all leisure activities and for a relaxing and exciting vacation with friends and family.

>> Vacations on the Kreischberg in Murau/Styria

  • 30-20 m2 for up to 10 people
  • wellness area available (saunas, indoor pool, children's pool & relaxation room)
  • Only 200 m from the valley station
  • dogs allowed (on request)

  

Kreischberg Chalets

Due to their position at the foot of the Kreischberg, the chalets are a perfect base from which to enjoy hiking, excursions and for an unparalleled winter vacation. Staying at this innovative and functional accommodation, everyone will find their perfect vacation home.

>> Vacation homes with hydro bath on the Kreischberg in Murau, directly on the ski slopes

  • 70-150 m2 for up to 14 people
  • partly with private sauna, hot tub (indoor and/or outdoor), swim spa
  • directly by the ski slopes
  • dogs allowed in some chalets (on request)

  

Kreischberg Suites

The two apartment houses with a total of 18 modern vacation apartments are located only a few metres from the valley station of the Kreischberg cable car and our Kreischberg Chalets. In winter you can start your skiing day on the "world-class" slopes of the Kreischberg World Cup mountain just a few steps away from the apartment; in summer you can start your first hikes "from the house".

>> Modern vacation apartments at the foot of the Kreischberg in Murau

  • 27-72 m2 for up to 6 people
  • with private infrared sauna
  • only a few metres from the valley station

  

Kreischberg Pool Villas

At the Kreischberg Pool Villas by ALPS RESORTS, the name says it all: All pools are heated and can therefore be used all year round. With the valley station only a 5-minute walk away, you will also find the best conditions for a successful skiing vacation in the Murau-Kreischberg region in Styria.

>> Luxurious vacation homes with pool and apartments with spa bath in Styria

  • 104-140 m2 for up to 10 people
  • private pool, spa and sauna
  • valley station only 350 m away

  

Almdorf Stadl

The Almdorf Stadl by ALPS RESORTS is located in the small community of Stadl an der Mur in a scenic idyll on the border of Styria and Salzburg Land. Both in summer and winter, vacationmakers enjoy the magnificent view of the Mur valley and the 1,981-metre-high Kreischberg mountain.

>> Feel-good vacation in a vacation home in Stadl an der Mur

  • 70-110 m2 for up to 9 people
  • partly with private wellness area (sauna, outdoor hot tub)
  • approx. 15 km from the Kreischberg ski area

  

Feriendorf Murau

The ALPS RESORTS vacation village Murau on the outskirts of the regional capital of Murau delights visitors with its dreamlike central, yet secluded location. In the lap of nature, you can slow down your everyday life and find the much longed-for relaxation during walks along the Mura or through the unspoilt countryside. Luxuriously equipped chalets offer you all the wellness comforts you deserve on your vacation. Enjoy your vacation in the vacation home with spa bath in Murau in Murtal/Styria:

>> Chalet Wellness Murau

>> Vacation village Murau

  • 70-135 m2 for up to 12 people
  • partly with private wellness area (pool, sauna, hot tub, swim spa)
  • approx. 5 km from the ski slope
  • dogs allowed in one of the chalets (on request)

  

Naturpark Chalets Lambrecht

The ALPS Naturpark Chalets Lambrecht offers the best conditions for your summer or winter vacation directly by the ski slopes. The vacation resort is situated in a sunny location in the middle of the Zirbitzkogel-Grebenzen Nature Park. Thanks to the ideal location directly by the ski slope and the immediate proximity to the centre of St. Lambrecht, nothing stands in the way of an unforgettable vacation in Styria.

>> Vacation homes in the Zirbitzkogel-Grebenzen Nature Park in Styria

  • 130 m2 for up to 11 people
  • private sauna
  • directly by the ski slopes
  • dogs allowed in one of the chalets (on request)

  

Alpenpark Turracher Höhe

In the middle of one of the largest Swiss stone pine forests in Austria and framed by numerous peaks, a stay in the Alpenpark Turracher Höhe by ALPS RESORTS is a very special experience, unparalleled in Austria.

Vacation homes on the Turracher Höhe:

>> Alpine Park Turrach Zirbenwald

>> Alpine Park Turrach Alpenblume

  • 32-140 m2 for up to 16 people
  • partly with private wellness area (sauna, indoor and/or outdoor hot pot)
  • vacation apartments directly by the ski slopes, chalets 1 – 2 km from the slopes
  • dogs allowed in certain accommodation (on request)

  

Turrach Lodges

The new Turrach Lodges form a luxurious hideaway on the Turracher Höhe. These light and airy semi-detached houses are located at 1,700 metres above sea level in the Nockberge region on the border between Carinthia and Styria.

>> Luxurious chalets on the Turracher Höhe in Styria

  • 125-147 m2 for up to 10 people
  • private sauna
  • approx. 1.5 km from the cable car

  

Hideaway Planneralm

Carinthia – Styria border: It is easy to relax at the Hideaway Planneralm. A comfortable retreat in these high-quality vacation apartments, 1,600m above sea level, only 350m from the slopes. Top: With the Schladming-Dachstein Sommercard included in the price of your vacation, you can enjoy more than 100 services.

>> High-quality vacation apartments on the Planneralm, Styria

  • 36-90 m² for up to 8 people
  • partly private sauna
  • near the slopes
  • Schladming-Dachstein Sommercard included

Bavaria

Ferienresort Inzell

In Inzell, amongst the Chiemgau Alps and only 35 km from Salzburg, you will find the ALPS RESORTS Inzell: Eleven new vacation homes, each with its own outdoor pool on the terrace and private sauna, make up the first vacation resort in Germany for Alps Resorts.

>> Modern vacation homes with pool and sauna in Chiemgau/Bavaria

  • 128-142 m² for up to 8 people
  • private Finnish sauna
  • partly with pool and/or hot tub
  • approx. 3 km from the ski slopes

  

Englmar Chalets

Located in the health resort of Sankt Englmar, a vacation in the Englmar Chalets by ALPS RESORTS is particularly relaxing and close to nature. The modern vacation homes in the Bavarian Forest meet every wish, including sauna and hot tub. See for yourself!

>> Vacation in Sankt Englmar in the Bavarian Forest Nature Park

  • 80-100 m² for up to 10 people
  • private sauna, partly hot tub
  • approx. 1.2 km from the ski area

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Only selected and tested accommodation
elements.subtitle: Quality is our number one priority
elements.caption: Every property is checked before your arrival to ensure the best possible stay.

elements.title: Guaranteed availability and on-site service
elements.subtitle: Make the most of our experience
elements.caption: Key collection is arranged by our helpful staff.  Available 24/7 or on-site service to help you with all your questions, e.g.: tips and insights for your holiday destination and your booked accommodation.

elements.title: A memorable holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why Interhome
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, feel the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or the Spanish way of life. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online - quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
